subject: Horse Racing
Breeders' Cup World Thoroughbred Championships
lead_paragraph: Derby fever descended on Carl Nafzger on Saturday as soon as Street Sense captured the Juvenile by 10 lengths, the largest margin of victory in the race’s 23-year history.
snippet: Derby fever descended on Carl Nafzger on Saturday as soon as Street Sense captured the Juvenile by 10 lengths, the largest margin of victory in the race’s 23-year history.
